_prev_prog_3.EquipmentTested: All vessels, valves, flanges, compressors, heat exchangers, etc. as part of the PSSR process

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
The Limestone Renewable Natural Gas (RNG) Plant is located at 7960 South Stateline Road, in Lowellville, Ohio. The Limestone Renewable Natural Gas (RNG) Plant processes landfill gas (LFG - ~50% methane) from the nearby Republic Carbon Limestone Landfill and converts it to RNG (95-98% methane). This is done through a series of processes which include H2S removal, moisture removal, compression, CO2 removal, and N2 removal.
The Limestone regulated substances were inventoried against the RMP list. The only chemical that reaches the RMP threshold quantity is methane. For this release scenario, and since the methane is a gas and not liquid, the specific consequence evaluated was Vapor Cloud Explosion (VCE). This Risk Management Plan (RMP) is the initial plan for the EDL Limestone Renewable Natural Gas (RNG) Plant in Lowellville, Ohio. 
A HSEQ-Emergency Response Plan (ERP), Rev 4/06/2023, has been developed for Limestone. 
(b) Non-responding stationary source. Limestone employees will not respond to accidental releases of regulated RMP substances and meet the requirements below: (68.90)
(1) Limestone does not have regulated toxic substance(s) stored above the threshold quantity, so Limestone is not required to be included in the community emergency response plan. 
(2) Limestone only has regulated flammable substance(s) stored above the threshold quantity and has coordinated response actions with the local fire department. 
(3) Limestone has appropriate mechanisms in place to notify emergency responders when there is a need for a response. For each subpart in the ERP, Section 3, there are instructions regarding when and how to contact Emergency Services 911. 
(4) Limestone will perform annual emergency response coordination activities; and
(5) Limestone will perform annual notification exercises. 
Prevention Program, Level 3 - The EDL Limestone facility is subject to Program Level 3 because it is not eligible for Program 1 and is subject to OSHA's PSM standard under federal

OSHA programs.  Limestone has written process safety information and PHAs which allow Limestone to identify and understand the hazards posed by the processes involving regulated substances. This includes information pertaining to the hazards of the regulated substances used or produced by the process, information pertaining to the technology of the process, and information pertaining to the equipment in the process. 
The five-year accident history - This section is not applicable as this is the first RMP submission for Limestone. Submission (68.150)
For a submission and/or resubmission of an RMP*eSubmit, a facility is required to review all sections of the RMP, update as appropriate, and certify that the entire updated RMP is true, accurate, and complete. In March 2009, EPA launched RMP*eSubmit, a Web-based system that allows facilities to securely submit and make corrections to their RMPs. The RMP*eSubmit software application is easy to use, improves data quality, and enables you to access your RMP 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
	Section 1: Registration Information
	Section(s) 2-3: Worst Case and Alternate Release Scenarios (Toxic)
	Section(s) 4-5: Worst Case and Alternate Release Scenarios (Flammable) 
	Section 6: Accident History  
	Sections 7-8: Prevention Program 
	Section 9: Emergency Response 
In April 2023, the EDL Limestone Initial RMP was submitted as a single RMP with the required information using the CDX, RMP*eSubmit Portal as specified by the EPA.  See Appendix B for a copy of the submittal and confirmation email of the certification by the Responsible Official.
An alternative scenario was used that goes beyond stored vessels and the scenario chosen used 150% of capacity of pipe flow with a release scenario beyond auto-shutdown mechanisms, etc. Section 5, the Flammable Alternative Worst Case Scenario (5.4) will not allow a value in this cell higher than the threshold quantity in (1.17), therefore, the threshold quantity was entered for the Alter
